about_the_game:
Challenge your friends on a one-on-one simple, easy-to-handle 2D platform. Play as Aliens mastering elementary powers such as Fire, Frost and Arcanes. Customize your character as well as the Game modes, and let the face-to-face begins!

• 2 Local split screen players (NO MODE SOLO)

• 4 Different Modes

• 3 Playable elements

• 20 Levels

• Bonuses and other customizations

• Includes next update and bug fixing


This mini game was created during lockdown and it is in constant development, I hope you will enjoy it. It has been made profitable to allow us to finance our studies and our future projects, thanks in advance to those who will support us.

name: Alien Duel Elements

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Joysticks and Screen 1280x720p or higher (Recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Joysticks and Screen 1280x720p or higher (Recommended)

short_description: Challenge your friends on a one-on-one simple, easy-to-handle 2D platform. Play as Aliens mastering elementary powers such as Fire, Frost and Arcanes. Customize your character as well as the Game modes.
